response.overview: PRICELESS tells a story of crime, money, greed and the value of the human soul.  The cast includes acclaimed actor Peter Greene known for his roles in iconic films like Pulp Fiction, The Mask, The Usual Suspects, Training Day and most recently the 50cent produced TV series For Life. Peter is often known for playing the villain, and in this new film he plays the ultimate villain: The #Devil himself.  Co-starring Hardcore Punk legend/Rapper/Graffiti Artist Danny Diablo as a high-level drug dealer; the two stars take you on a dark journey into the criminal underworld; and into the belly of the beast.  The second short film from director Tom Vujcic founder of Reel Wolf Productions known for his work in the underground hiphop and metal communities having worked with acts like Tech N9NE, Slipknot, Necro, Mobb Deep, Jedi Mind Tricks just to name a few.  Director Biography - Tom Vujcic
response.title: Priceless
